title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.6 - Part-time employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 147.6 - Part-time employees

State Regulations

Part-time employees shall be eligible for performance
advances on the same basis as full-time employees. Performance awards, longevity performance awards and merit payments shall be paid on a prorated
basis, based on the employee's status on July 1st for performance awards and
merit payments, and March 31st for longevity performance
awards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
147.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
